```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
moisture = read_sheet(ss = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1010Hkv3ZUsJjCNG9WqsKpI0sMiHM5ywLgEc-MlNiv0w/edit?usp=sharing", sheet = "Total")
```

```{r}
data = moisture %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(date = mdy(date)) %>% 
  mutate(dm = paste(date, drought_or_control, sep =""))


ggplot(data, aes(date, moisture, group = dm, fill = drought_or_control)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("cornflowerblue","darkgoldenrod2"), breaks = c( "C", "D"), name = "Drought", labels = c("No", "Yes"))
```
